Params: {3: "Red currents flash as they enshroud the Narwhal's long horn, illuminating the rare excitement on Alpha's face."}
{3: 'Alpha slowly looks up and sees a strange, silent flash in the direction of the port.'}
{3: 'An extremely fast object approaches, parting the surface of the ocean in its wake—'}
{3: '—and she catches the powerful long-distance blast with her bare hand.'}
{3: 'She glances at her smoking right hand...'}
{3: 'The attack draws her attention away, allowing the Narwhal to temporarily escape her control and begins to dive into the sea for a brief respite.'}
{3: 'Just as the Narwhal dives beneath the waves, she leaps and and lands on a floating dock in the port.'}
{3: 'After landing back on the ground, she looks around for the one who unleashed the attack.'}
{3: 'Quickly, she has her eyes set on the most conspicuous figure in the crowd.'}
{3: "Rosetta's whole body still emits heat from the blast just now, turning the snow beneath her feet to steam."}
{3: 'Alpha tuns her palm toward Rosetta with an eerie smile on her face.'}
{3: 'Rosetta draws another folded lance from her shield and extends it, assuming a combat stance.'}
{3: 'This is the first time the two of them meet since the encounter at City 015.'}
{3: 'Just as Lucia prepares to draw her blade—'}
{3: "Rosetta leaps forward menacingly, casting a massive shadow on Alpha's small figure."}
{3: 'Their blades clash in a vibrant display of sparks.'}
{3: 'With their bodies pressed against each other, Rosetta lowers her head and glares at Alpha dismissively as she issues the order.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'That Narwhal has been sending out signals as if trying to communicate with somebody... Looks like that was you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta exerts a sudden burst of power into her strikes, pushing Alpha back.'}
{3: 'Alpha looks at Rosetta, then glances at the port citizens behind her.'}
